Author: rzioma
Content:
Is there a minimum distance requirement between the chip and the binding pad on a PCB?
I am thinkng about 0.5x1 chip but rotate 90 degrees for placement.

Author: 246tnt
Content: I think 1.5x~2x the die thickness IIRC.

Author: rzioma
Content: What is the expected thickness of the die?

Author: anfroholic
Content: The ones I have are about 0.7mm

Author: 246tnt
Content: Although the numbers here are way off. IIRC the chips won't be back grinded so it'll be more like 800 um if it's anything like the sky130/ihp ones.

Author: anfroholic
Content: I also believe they will not be back grinded

Author: anfroholic
Content: What I drew above is pushing pretty close to the limits in spots

Author: rzioma
Content: @Andrew Wingate btw, those light blue outgoing lines? They don't (always) connect to the red pads. Are these the ideal wire "diretions"?

Author: anfroholic
Content:
I spent maybe 10 minutes on this. 
Just sharing for the sake of sharing. The lines you see are just the old lines from the old version and don't really mean anything

Author: anfroholic
Content:
Also @ReJ aka Renaldas Zioma

Author: anfroholic
Content: The wide version that's .6" between centers
